title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText of the SWT example, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard.
EB: I expect that no sound should be played when choosing SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText.
SR:
Follow these steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on the Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click again on the Styles SWT.MULTI.
